title: RivenGear Specialized Gear for Riven Players
body:
Order the **RivenGear Special Bundle** now and receive THREE specialized items to ensure a painless Riven experience for only 9.99$. 

Never let facial injuries hold you back again! That's right, for only 19.99$ you can get all the lazy pentakills you want *without* the tears and blood that comes with a broken nose! Indeed, the only tears will be those of your opponent's and their mechanically unintensive champion.

The **RivenGear Special Bundle** consists of:
- 1x RivenGear Protective Headgear
- 1x RivenGear Soft Keyboard
- 1x RivenGear Facial Injury First Aid Kit

All of which can be yours for a mere 29.99$. 

But wait! Order now and receive a **FREE** namechange coupon so that you can let everyone know of your Riven proficiency. Recent studies suggest that mechanically intensive players whose summoner names contain both *best* and *riven* win 18.73% more Riven games on average. 

All of these can be yours for just 199.99$ so what are you waiting for?! 
 **RivenGear for Riven players. ** Because you deserve the best.

replies.body: Great! Now I can succesfully make LC$ B1G Pl4YZ without causing substantial injuries to my facial area! Thanks RivenGear!

I know you are just trying to circlejerk the lcs big plays meme, but it usually help when the champion in question is actually picked in LCS, unlike Riven.

*slips 5 bucks into your shirt pocket* shhhhhhh...
This is a really poor and unfunny Riven QQ thread. Might wanna use that time to learn the matchup and get better at the game instead of crying and circlejerking on the boards.

How to beat riven: mobility and/or resourceless poke.

If you aren't playing one of the seven champs that satisfy these conditions, then that's just too bad, you better hope it's a bad riven.
how to beat riven: zone her from cs and don't all in her or let her melee you.
You fool, you're disrupting the circlejerk! You'll be destroyed!
FUCK i tried to help them actually solve their problem!

That or just play Farmville with Jax or Nasus.

Everyone loves Farmville.
Have you tried Darius?

I beat riven in 5 lane match ups I recall, and I don't play top often. Let me know if I am missing anything.

Jax.

Caitlyn.

Corki.

Garen.

Ryze.

Well this is kinda besides the point, being a troll build and all, but full AP Nasus is really hard to win lane against, if you don't shut the Nasus down before he hits 4. So AP Nasus top is another one.
I play a lot of Riven, and I thought this was hilarious.
THIS

sees a bunch of people saying this is a QQ thread.

Notices its posted under memes and games.

leaves thread shaking head.

Op complains about faceroll champions.
Op's two main champion played: Pantheon & Sona.
in which they have resources, and aren't both only have 1-2 forms of cc while having limited mobility

Op sarcastically comment on "hard game mechanics" for riven, plays pantheon and sona.
Dumb person come in trying to defend idiotic statement
Yeah man, Pantheon and sona should NEVER be played unless you have over 400 APM MINIMUM.
Rofl
QQ more about Riven.
LOL
Pantheon and Sona not faceroll champs.
rofl
What a joke.
rofl
rofl

Op makes a funny post. 
Post soars over 1st HanarSpectre's head. 
1st HanarSpectre gets defensive and tries to argue the joke. 
Readers are saddened.

To be fair, this guy has a record of not knowing what he is talking about, failing to understand simple concepts, and missing out of very obvious jokes and sarcasm.

Poor guy. I hope he finds a home soon so I don't have to see him post anymore :')

Edit: The hanar must be disgraced to have someone such as him be their first specter. This is why they don't have a seat at the council :')

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuL9q7tNmQ0

http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1sbbql/whats_the_deal_with_riven_players/


P.S. I don't hate {{champion:92}} I just hate the people that play her, kind of like {{champion:17}}...
But can Rivin literally do this? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mNuWIZZaysU

Can we have one for Katarina as well? I already got the name change so I think this kit would really help me when I'm in a teamfight. Lately I have been getting bloody noses every teamfight, and it is frustrating when I have to go AFK to clean it.
OMG, I can finally play my main without girls looking at my black eyes......
I love how its always the people who don't even play the champ that complain about it LOL
